last_episode_to_air.name: The Finale
last_episode_to_air.overview: A surprise at the finish line leaves everyone shellshocked. The teams reconvene six months later to settle some beef and find out the big winner of King of the Road.

name: King of the Road
overview: King of the Road is an institution in skateboarding. Started by Thrasher magazine in 2003, it's a demented, roving adventure that follows various skate teams across the country as they compete to accomplish a set list of tasks, some of which carry great risk of bodily harm, and others that don't involve skateboarding at all (but still might carry great risk of bodily harm).

seasons.name: Season 2016
seasons.overview: VICELAND has teamed up with Thrasher for the 2016 season, which will feature the Birdhouse, Chocolate, and Toy Machine teams hauling ass across America, throwing their bodies and whatever dignity they might have had into the wind for a chance to become the reigning King of the Road.

1.status_message: The resource you requested could not be found.

episodes.name: The Quickest Piss in the West!
episodes.overview: The games begin in Albuquerque, starting with a heinous ramp malfunction and ending with an even more horrific pee-drinking challenge. The teams get The Book and hit the streets.

episodes.name: Is This Safe?
episodes.overview: Enjoi goes without water in their "Breaking Rad" suits while Creature builds the world's longest beer bong. Dan Lu's challenges for Deathwish prove more difficult than expected.

episodes.name: Handcuffed in Hell Paso
episodes.overview: Friendships are strained as two guys on each team must remain handcuffed together for 24 hours. Creature shoots guns, and Lizard and Foy fight over taking a shower.

episodes.name: All In a Day's Twerk
episodes.overview: Foy battles the daunting ski jump one last time. Pilz wallrides over a twerking panda, Beakkel scores heavy points, and The Muscle destroys himself trying a trick.

episodes.name: Feel the Splat Baby
episodes.overview: Deathwish explores secret tunnels in AZ while Creature gets their minds blown at an impromptu rave with Jaws. Enjoi's heavy metal makeover ends with the grossest challenge yet.

episodes.name: Why's America So Big?
episodes.overview: With Andy as referee, the teams meet in Lake Havasu to pick up their Mystery Guests and compete in some very unsportsmanlike events. Creature's attempt at sabotage fails spectacularly.

episodes.name: The Return of the Butt Chug
episodes.overview: The Mystery Guest girls go big, Creature melts down at Andy Mac's race track, and once again someone butt chugs... but Gravette's got a surprise of his own.

episodes.name: Handrails, Homies!
episodes.overview: Creature turns Russell pro with a little help from his mom. Deathwish rides giant rails with the Muska. Foy, Muscle and Enzo glue pubes to their lips.

episodes.name: Torture in Paradise
episodes.overview: The teams are whisked away to a top secret destination for their last two days. Enjoi gets seasick, Deathwish goes cliff diving, and Gravette faces his greatest fear.

episodes.name: Hawaiian Psycho Jam
episodes.overview: With time running out in Hawaii, local skaters help the teams get last tricks. Final challenges take place on a floating ramp, and Creature plays one more epic prank on Gravette.

episodes.name: And the Winner Is...
episodes.overview: It's awards night -- King of the Road style! Weird challenges, surprise guests and some tables are gonna get broken. Plus, two amateurs end the night as new pros!

episodes.name: Get the Goddamn Pig's Feet
episodes.overview: The race starts in Reno with a relay. Evan crushes while Glick gets stage fright. The Books are handed out and Foundation ends the night with a tender moment at a wedding chapel.

episodes.name: Death by Pizza
episodes.overview: Foundation can only eat pizza, which Nick promptly forgets. Element hits insane terrain with Cardiel while Real revisits the 90s and gigantic pants with Mike Carroll and Chico.

episodes.name: Chained Up And Tripped Out
episodes.overview: While Evan gets trippy, Sinclair starts pranking Nick. Jack suffers a double sacking while triple handcuffs end in a bizarre shaving cream party for Foundation.

episodes.name: Get Your War Face On
episodes.overview: Element skates a real tank with Louie while Zion gets a very special surprise on P-Stone day. Foundation's run in San Francisco ends with a stomach-turning prank on Nick.

episodes.name: Game Of Stoke
episodes.overview: The trip gets medieval when the teams arrive at a bizarre dirtboard racetrack. Andy turns demonic and Evan eats a dog turd. The Mystery Guests arrive and start stacking points.

episodes.name: Hill Bomb in Diapers
episodes.overview: The teams jock out, trying their hand at normal sports. Bam Margera arrives to help Element skate a coffin, Merlino loses a butt cheek and a Jaws stunt ends in the worst injury yet.

episodes.name: Bruised Ribs & Broken Teeth
episodes.overview: After smashing his teeth, Jaws rejoins Real for a heavy handrail day with Jamie Thomas. While Tyson goes for the biggest rail of all time, Foundation takes a break to party.

episodes.name: Dusted in the Desert
episodes.overview: While Real has a karaoke brunch with Nora Vasconcellos, Element and Foundation head out to the desert for some heavy challenges. With Jaws out, Kyle steps up on biggest drop.

episodes.name: Phoenix Rising
episodes.overview: The teams get a taste of fatherhood with the Baby on Board challenge. Last-minute bounties push Evan to his breaking point and Zion into his biggest stunt yet.

episodes.name: The Finale
episodes.overview: A surprise at the finish line leaves everyone shellshocked. The teams reconvene six months later to settle some beef and find out the big winner of King of the Road.

episodes.name: Team Watch Party
episodes.overview: Watch the skaters watch themselves! 6 months later everyone watches the premiere.
